DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine cumulative irritation potential product list Sponsor .
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy , adult volunteer either sex patch daily his/her back multiple strength AN2718 2 different topical dosage form active comparator course 21 consecutive day . Twenty-four hour application , patch remove site evaluate use five-point scale irritation .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet follow criterion inclusion study . 1 . Healthy volunteer either sex , least 18 year age old . 2 . Females must nonchildbearing potential ( i.e. , postmenopausal surgically sterile [ bilateral oophorectomy and/or total hysterectomy ] ) . All female must submit urine pregnancy test negative result Day 1 final study visit . 3 . Subjects may skin type race provide degree skin pigmentation interfere make reading skin reaction . 4 . Willingness follow study procedure complete study . 5 . Written inform consent obtain . 1 . Any skin disease would way confound interpretation study result . Atopic dermatitis/eczema , psoriasis exclude . 2 . Chronic asthma exclude . 3 . Pregnant nursing mother . 4 . A history sensitivity component formulation . 5 . Use chronic medication ( antihistamine , corticosteroid , analgesic antiinflammatories ) one week study .
